## Basic Commands

```{r}
x <- c(1, 3, 2, 5)
x

x = c(1, 6, 2)
y = c(1, 4, 3)
x

length(x)
length(y)
x + y 
```

ls() function is used to check a list of all of the saved objects, such as data and functions.

rm() function is used to remove objects
```{r}
ls()

rm(x,y)
ls()
```
Remove all objects at once:
```{r}
rm(list = ls())
```
